title: PX7, T212-1, T205 Piedmont 42 for sale.

posts.post_title: PX7, T212-1, T205 Piedmont 42 for sale.
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Ed Hans
1) PX7 Mordecai Brown thin face variation-nice front, but back damage-$SOLD delivered.
2) T212-1 1909 Obak Williams S.F.-SGC Authentic due to a small spot of added color on the front. Nice card-$SOLD delivered.
3) T205 Konetchy SGC40- scarce Piedmont factory 42 back-$85.00 delivered.

First come, first served. Please email or call to confirm. Check or money order only. Please send to Ed Hans P.O. Box 307 Buffalo, N.Y. 14207. (716) 876-6359-Evenings and weekends are best, but call anytime and leave a message. Or email at edhans@monkberry.com. Thanks for looking.
